PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02682022-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  DND
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to (1) introduce the Declaration of Victims Rights to the Code of Service Discipline; (2) introduce complementary changes to many court martial processes; (3) reform the summary trial into the summary hearing process; and (4) align the National Defence Act with Criminal Code provisions related to finding an accused not criminally responsible on account of mental disorder.
AttachmentsAttachment
